page.title: 18Springfield Health
page.content: {Stratheden Hospital}near Springfield treats and cares for people who are mentally ill. It was built in 1866. There are 700 patients, cared for by 42 doctors, 420 nurses and 230 other staff, in 27 wards. There are 45 children in the Childrens Wards. 30 of the patients attend the hospital daily. The patients are given various therapies including group therapies, occupational and industrial and recreational therapies. There are many recreational facilities and many of the patients are taken on outings. The money to run the hospital comes from the Government through The Scottish Home and Health Department and the Fife Health Board.
